remarks: Composition in the category of non-unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rngcco.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcco.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
rngcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
rngcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
rngcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. U ) $.
rngcco.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) $.
rngcco.g $e |- ( ph -> G : ( Base ` Y ) --> ( Base ` Z ) ) $.
rngcco $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) F ) = ( G o. F ) ) $.
